item.title: This Simple Trick Will Help You Stop Annoying Silence Notifications on Your iPhone XR!
item.description: Introduction Do you have an iPhone XR and are you constantly being bombarded by annoying silence notifications? If so, youâ€™re not alone! The iPhone XR is a great device, but it can be plagued by unwanted notifications. Fortunately, there is a simple trick that can help you stop these notifications and get back to enjoying your phone. What Causes Silence Notifications? Silence notifications are notifications that occur when your phone is in silent mode.
